website_summaries.verdict: Those who love the outdoors may find this utilitarian multi-sport sandal from KEEN appealing. It rendered trail protection, thanks to its burly toe cap. Not to mention, its durability did not compromise comfort which also earned appreciation. It, however, disappointed customers with its restrictive fit.Having all that said, the pros of Newport Eco from KEEN makes it worth a try. Potential buyers should try this first to determine if the width works for them.
pros: Most owners of the KEEN Newport Eco declared how comfortable the sandal was
It was ready for the trails from the get-go, according to a number of impressed buyers
A good deal of users mentioned that they were stoked with its functionality
They liked its performance in water and on the ground
The sturdy toe cap of the Newport Eco from KEEN received praises from scores of hikers
Several wearers testified to the durability of this hiking sandal
Its ability to dry quickly was not left unnoticed by the majority
Some new-to-the-brand online buyers commented that they did not hesitate to get another pair of KEEN Newport Eco for themselves and as a gift
cons: According to a bunch of brand loyalists, the Newport Eco has a tighter fit than other KEEN sandals they owned

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for a trip to Israel in the summertime. I needed something that was comfortable, durable, had good traction, and could take getting wet without slipping. These shoes are the real deal! After hiking over 50 miles thru deserts, mountains, cities, and trips into the Dead Sea and Jordan river these sandals never disappointed me! I would definitely recommend them to anyone. They fit about a half size larger than what I usually wear, so I went with a 10 versus a 10.5. One added bonus: the odor-resistant feature on this show is for real! Just ask any of my 28 fellow travelers!!!
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Size up one size, enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears an 11, I sized up to a 12, and the width is perfect. We know Keens can run small, and we were ready for it. He's already got 5 pairs of Keens and he's worn them to the ground...gluing when they break, and really using them hard. The shoes do hold up, but that's all he wears for shoes, every day, winter or summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kline

customer_reviews.title: KEENS are great !
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and very comfortable. I had another pair of Keens before this and they while still usable, they are starting to fall apart. This is after over 4 years of hiking, walking and wearing as my go to summer footwear. Keens may cost a lot but they will last and the company stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: They fit beautifully and are the usual wonderful Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is getting used to these. They are his first pair of men's keens and they are more difficult for him to get on than the kids ones were so we've had a couple of break-downs because he's eleven and sometimes we're in a hurry. They fit beautifully and are the usual wonderful Keen quality. I'd never take a chance on a different brand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat33

customer_reviews.title: Heed the size warning!
customer_reviews.text: Listen to everyone and if you are going to buy these - order a size bigger. I have many pairs of KEEN sandals and they are all 9.5 and fit like a dream. I could not even get my foot in a 9.5 of this style.
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe in warm weather--all the advantages of sandals with practicality of a real shoe. Shoes fits well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, durable as hell, and great looking. I love in these six months a year.
customer_reviews.author: Miles E. Keogh

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: The sole on these are a little softer to walk on than the ones I usually get. More comfortable for a day of walking. But the toe is still nice and hard.
customer_reviews.author: joey carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: They’re simply the best! Can’t go wrong with these keen sandals. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sandals. I am a gardener and I wear them every day to work. Super comfy and keep my toes protected while letting my feet breathe. They are a little stiff initially but once you break them in - most excellent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Take an extra pair to Belize to sell.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes/sandals. Wore them for a jungle hike in Belize. The folks there wanted to buy them from me everywhere I went.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclone1995

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but my husband had to return/exchange for the next size up. Fit way smaller than other Keens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, fits great, and built sturdy. I have had my previous pair for 7 years and they are still going strong. I wanted this pair for my family vacation and love the green color. I walked all day in them for five days straight with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keen are the best
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of keen sandals, and still wear the ones I bought 5 years ago. From river rapids wade fishing in the bay to surf fishing these sandals have held up is the roughest conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Howdy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfort. I was hoping for a little more comfort at this price range but probably still the best I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: that the shoes are comfortable to wear and that he is absolutely pleased with ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were ordered by me for a friend. He told me on Sunday August 12TH. that the shoes are comfortable to wear and that he is absolutely pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: loved it... but didn’t last as long as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable shoe. but lasted less than a year... good for water, sand, and boats. not so good for city life.
customer_reviews.author: E & S

customer_reviews.title: Great service. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were shipped the day I ordered them and arrived the next day. They fit as expected. I ordered a half size up after reading other reviews and they were perfect. I’m excited to wear them on my next hike!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Price

customer_reviews.title: SUMMER IS ON THE WAY .
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT EXAMPLE OF A QUALITY KEEN PRODUCT , YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: juancho sanchez

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the good old days of KEEN high quality products. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Great color, leather on top
customer_reviews.text: Great color, leather on top, loved them. I had some H2 s in the past and they lasted about 3 years, these feel slimmer with a little less cushion but Still great quality for the price and for what I use them for. What got me was that they are all black can’t go wrong, hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Andres P.

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap isn’t adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The sandal isn’t adjustable around the ankle so it’s tight on me
customer_reviews.author: Don C.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Signs of wear!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my fiance's bday. I opened the package when it arrived just to see used and worn our shoes!! Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Monika J

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Deff love the black on. Black ,, they r keen so very good quality ,, my third pair ,,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This size does not match.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received 9,5 D(M) US - 275mm - They are VERY small! Fit guide on keenfootwear.com shows very different data. 9,5 D(M) US = 267mm
customer_reviews.author: Andrii Tanich

product_meta.title: Keen Men's Newport Eco Closed Toe Sandals
product_meta.description: Keen sandal for men, the Newport Eco, is a lightweight, flexible sandal, designed for a natural fit and comes with a secure lace-capture system. More features: washable, recycled p.E.T.. polyester webbing, waterproof, salt-resistant leather panels, metatomical molded eva footbed, compression molded eva midsole for cushioning, quick-dry lining for active use, non-marking rubber outsole infused with upcycled rice husk, multi-directional lug pattern with razor siping.
